snippet.title: Throne Quest RPG Trailer
snippet.description:
Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.valorware.thronequest
Google Play free demo: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.valorware.thronequestdemo

Steam (Coming soon): https://store.steampowered.com/app/989160/Throne_Quest/
Itch: http://valorware.itch.io/thronequest
Gamejolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/thronequest/381179

Solo dev project! I did the programming, graphics, music and level deisgn by myself. Using Godot 3 engine
Throne Quest is a language-less, seem-less open-world Action Role Playing Game (ARPG). Delve into the adventurous world full of dungeons and forts, fighting 90 types of vicious monsters and search for over 150 unique items of loot. Switch between 12 classes throwing your axes, fire, harps and even a djenty guitar in fast-paced combat whilst gulping potions and collecting drops to level-up and become a champion with one epic Quest- to claim the Throne held by demon boss in the central castle.
